<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Improved Swift Banishment](/Feats.aspx?ID=307) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 127 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Swift Banishment](/Feats.aspx?ID=301)

</column>

---

You easily banish creatures with your weapon. You can use Swift Banishment as long as you have a spell slot of 5th level or higher remaining, even if you don’t have [_banishment_](/Spells.aspx?ID=19) prepared. You must sacrifice a prepared spell of 5th level or higher, and the _banishment_ effect you create is heightened to the level of that spell. Your weapon serves as the special material component of _banishment_, causing the target to take the –2 penalty to its save against any _banishment_ you cast using Swift Banishment.
name: Improved Swift Banishment
